@PublicAPI(stability=PRIVATE)

Package org.opends.server.replication.service

This package contains the generic of the Multi-Master replication code that works on the Directory Server side.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DSRSShutdownSync
    Class useful for the case where DS/RS instances are collocated inside the same JVM.
    ReplicationBroker
    The broker for Multi-master Replication.
    ReplicationDomain
    This class should be used as a base for Replication implementations.
    ReplicationDomain.ImportExportContext
    This class contains the context related to an import or export launched on the domain.
    ReplicationMonitor
    Class used to generate monitoring information for the replication.

Package org.opends.server.replication.service Description

This package contains the generic of the Multi-Master replication code that works on the Directory Server side.
Developers planning to use the Replication Service should subClass the HREF="ReplicationDomain.html">ReplicationDomain class
